DataElement.preferredName: EPIC-26 - Quality of Erections Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation in the past 4 weeks their usual quality of their erections, using a 4 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Questionnaire Domain EPIC-26 - Quality of Erections Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to questionnaire._The Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Short Form (EPIC-26) How would you describe the usual quality of your erections during the last 4 weeks?_A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
